com.articulate.sigma
Class Graph

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.articulate.sigma.Graph
public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object

Handle operations for creating a graphical representation of partial ordering relations. Supports Graph.jsp.

Constructor Summary

static java.util.ArrayList createGraph(KB kb, java.lang.String term, java.lang.String relation, int above, int below, java.lang.String indentChars)
          Create a ArrayList with a set of terms comprising a hierarchy Each term String will be prefixed with an appropriate number of indentChars.

Method Detail

createGraph

public static java.util.ArrayList createGraph(KB kb,
                                              java.lang.String term,
                                              java.lang.String relation,
                                              int above,
                                              int below,
                                              java.lang.String indentChars)
Create a ArrayList with a set of terms comprising a hierarchy Each term String will be prefixed with an appropriate number of indentChars.

Parameters:
kb - the knowledge base being graphed
term - the term in the KB being graphed
relation - the binary relation that is used to forms the arcs in the graph.
above - the number of levels above the given term in the graph
below - the number of levels below the given term in the graph
indentChars - a String of characters to be used for indenting the terms
